biocontainers.name: obitools
biocontainers.summary: Set of python programs developed to simplify the manipulation of sequence files. they were mainly designed to help us for analyzing next generation sequencer outputs (454 or illumina) in the context of dna metabarcoding.

biotools.summary: Set of python programs developed to simplify the manipulation of sequence files. They were mainly designed to help us for analyzing Next Generation Sequencer outputs (454 or Illumina) in the context of DNA Metabarcoding.

bioschemas.name: OBITools
bioschemas.summary: Set of python programs developed to simplify the manipulation of sequence files. They were mainly designed to help us for analyzing Next Generation Sequencer outputs (454 or Illumina) in the context of DNA Metabarcoding.

galaxy.summary: OBITools is a set of programs developed to simplify the manipulation of sequence files
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Set of python programs developed to simplify the manipulation of sequence files. They were mainly designed to help us for analyzing Next Generation Sequencer outputs (454 or Illumina) in the context of DNA Metabarcoding.

related_workflows.name: Workflow constructed from history 'Analysis of DNA metabarcoding / eDNA data produced on Illumina sequencers using the OBITools on Galaxy'
